name: ChromaDB Minimal (Python)
description: Create a collection, insert, and query with ChromaDB (Python).

files.template:
from chromadb import Client
client = Client()
col = client.create_collection('docs')
col.add(
    ids=['1', '2'],
    documents=['hello world', 'fluorite mcp']
)
res = col.query(query_texts=['hello'], n_results=2)
print(res)
